glsa.title: python-updater: Untrusted search path
glsa.synopsis: An untrusted search path vulnerability in python-updater might result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: python-updater is a script used to remerge python packages when changing Python version.

description.p: Robert Buchholz of the Gentoo Security Team reported that python-updater includes the current working directory and subdirectories in the Python module search path (sys.path) before calling "import".

workaround.p: Do not run "python-updater" from untrusted working directories.

resolution.p: All python-updater users should upgrade to the latest version:
